sentences.en: Always breathe through your nose.
sentences.cn: 要一直用鼻子呼吸。

sentences.en: Breathe out and ease your knees in toward your chest.
sentences.cn: 呼气，膝部放松向胸部靠拢。

sentences.en: Don't worry, I wouldn't breathe a word of your secret.
sentences.cn: 别担心, 我不会泄漏你的秘密.

sentences.en: He could scarcely breathe.
sentences.cn: 他几乎喘不过气来。

sentences.en: Hold your breath for a count of five, then slowly breathe out.
sentences.cn: 屏住气息数五下，然后慢慢地呼气。

sentences.en: I'm sweating, my heart is pounding. I can't breathe.
sentences.cn: 我浑身冒汗，心脏狂跳，呼吸困难。

sentences.en: Leather uppers allow the feet to breathe.
sentences.cn: 皮革鞋帮使脚得以透气。

sentences.en: People are concerned about the quality of the air they breathe.
sentences.cn: 人们关心他们所呼吸的空气的质量。

sentences.en: Place your hands on the small of your back and breathe in.
sentences.cn: 双手置于腰部，吸气。

sentences.en: Pythons kill by tightening their coils so that their victim cannot breathe.
sentences.cn: 大蟒蛇紧紧盘绕猎物使之无法呼吸，从而杀死猎物。

sentences.en: Red wines should be allowed to "breathe" if possible before drinking.
sentences.cn: 如果可能的话，在饮用红酒前应该先开瓶透透气。

sentences.en: Relax and breathe deeply (=  take in a lot of air  ) .
sentences.cn: 放松，深呼吸。

sentences.en: Remember to breathe regularly.
sentences.cn: 记住要保持呼吸均匀。

sentences.en: she wouldn't breathe freely again until she was airborne.
sentences.cn: 直到飞机起飞以后她才松了口气。

sentences.en: The boss was breathing down my neck all morning.
sentences.cn: 老板整个上午都死死地盯着我

sentences.en: The crowd pressed together so tightly that we could hardly breathe.
sentences.cn: 人群挤在一起,我们几乎喘不过气来.

sentences.en: The doctor asked me to breathe in, then to breathe out fully.
sentences.cn: 医生让我先吸气, 然后全部呼出.

sentences.en: the Prime Minister would breathe new life into his party.
sentences.cn: 总理会为他的政党注入新的活力。

sentences.en: The room filled with smoke, and it was becoming difficult to breathe.
sentences.cn: 房间里全是烟，呼吸越来越困难。

sentences.en: We lifted our heads to breathe in the fresh, clear air.
sentences.cn: 我们抬起头,吸进新鲜 、 干净的空气.

sentences.en: You had to listen hard to hear the old man breathe.
sentences.cn: 你要仔细听才能听见老人的呼吸声。

words.tran_cn: 喘不过气来的；停止呼吸的
呼吸，气息；一口气，（呼吸的）一次；瞬间，瞬息；微风；迹象；无声音，气音
呼吸者；呼吸的东西；剧烈的运动；短时间的休息
呼吸（breath的过去式和过去分词）
呼吸；低语；松口气；（风）轻拂
呼吸；使喘息；流露；低声说

phrases.tran_cn: （害怕，紧张之后）放松，放下心来
严密监视：严密地监视，常指令人恼恨地

phrases.phrase: breathe easily 或 breathe easy  或 breathe freely
phrases.tran_cn: 松一口气，放下心来：尤指一段时间的紧张后放松或解脱
呼吸通畅；松一口气；安心

trans.tran_cn: 呼吸，呼气，低声说，透气，充满
trans.tran_en: to take air into your lungs and send it out again
